output.sentences: The bishops gathered for their monthly meeting.
They listened to a quick briefing that was read by Bishop Hayward.
After listening to the briefing, the bishops launched into a discussion of the church's current affairs.
Bishop Smith listened intently as the other bishops talked about church matters.
Then, Bishop Smith passionately shared his own opinion; his frustration was plainly displayed on his face.
